shorts.title: Paige Cognetti claims victory in Scranton mayoral race
shorts.title_distilled: Paige Cognetti claims victory in Scranton mayoral race.
shorts.description: LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — 28/22 News was awaiting results Tuesday night from many key races in our area on this Election Day as ballots were counted on everything from mayors, council members, and commissioners. A big one is the mayor of Scranton, and the results so far appear to show the Electric City will keep [...]
shorts.content: LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — 28/22 News was awaiting results Tuesday night from many key races in our area on this Election Day as ballots were counted on everything from mayors, council members, and commissioners. A big one is the mayor of Scranton, and the results so far appear to show the Electric City will keep [...]
shorts.content_distilled: LACKAWANNA COUNTY  — 28/22 News was awaiting results Tuesday night from many key races in our area on this Election Day as ballots were counted on everything from mayors, council members, and commissioners.

shorts.title: Deer crashes drive business to NEPA auto body shops
shorts.title_distilled: Deer crashes drive business to NEPA auto body shops.
shorts.description: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Now that the sun sets earlier in the evening, more drivers are on the road while deer are most active. The inevitable animal collisions are leading to pile-ups at auto body shops during this time of year. The Autumn months are considered the busy season for body shops. While back-to-school [...]
